main.name: Michail Gerogiannis
main.description: who has a passion for computer science and enjoys building robust software solutions. Furthermore, I consider myself as a novel lover and an art enthusiast. The closest to me people might say that I'm also a science freak especially with topics that are related to space exploration
main.bio: I am currently based in the Netherlands, working at Rademaker B.V as a Software Engineer and I bring with me a variety of skills, including programming and application development, using mostly C# and Python. My main interests are focused on Artificial Intelligence, Reinforcement Learning and Cloud based technologies.

projects.title: Machine Learning techniques for predicting tokens in integrated development environments

testimonials.text: Those who can imagine anything, can create the impossible.
